languages.text: Мудрые Адептус Механикус обратились с молебенным запросом к священным машинам геологического наблюдения. Проанализировав благословенные ритмы сейсмической активности, они передали Лорд-капитану отчет с предполагаемыми координатами лагерей боевиков. Повстанцы были заперты в своих логовах и приготовились к последней отчаянной обороне.

traits.locale_text: Мудрые Адептус Механикус обратились с молебенным запросом к священным машинам геологического наблюдения. Проанализировав благословенные ритмы сейсмической активности, они передали Лорд-капитану отчет с предполагаемыми координатами лагерей боевиков. Повстанцы были заперты в своих логовах и приготовились к последней отчаянной обороне.

languages.text: The wise ones of the Adeptus Mechanicus appealed to the sacred machines of geological monitoring with prayerful enquiries. After analysing the blessed rhythms of seismic activity, they gave the Lord Captain a report with the supposed coordinates of the rebels' camps. The rebels were locked inside their lairs, preparing to take one last, desperate stand.

languages.text: 帝国技術局の賢人は、地質モニタリングを行う聖機械に祈りを捧げて問いかけた。地震活動の聖なる律動を分析した賢人は、反乱軍キャンプの座標と思われる場所をロード・キャプテンに告げた。反乱軍は隠れ家に追いやられ、最後の抵抗に向けて準備をしていた。
languages.original_text: The wise ones of the Adeptus Mechanicus appealed to the sacred machines of geological monitoring with prayerful enquiries. After analysing the blessed rhythms of seismic activity, they gave the Lord Captain a report with the supposed coordinates of the rebels' camps. The rebels were locked inside their lairs, preparing to take one last, desperate stand.

traits.locale_text: 帝国技術局の賢人は、地質モニタリングを行う聖機械に祈りを捧げて問いかけた。地震活動の聖なる律動を分析した賢人は、反乱軍キャンプの座標と思われる場所をロード・キャプテンに告げた。反乱軍は隠れ家に追いやられ、最後の抵抗に向けて準備をしていた。

languages.text: 机械修会的智者们向神圣的地质监测机器发出了祈求。在分析了地震活动的相关数据之后，他们向舰长大人提交了一份报告，其中包含叛军营地可能位置的坐标。残存的叛军躲在巢穴里，准备进行最后的孤注一掷。
languages.original_text: The wise ones of the Adeptus Mechanicus appealed to the sacred machines of geological monitoring with prayerful enquiries. After analysing the blessed rhythms of seismic activity, they gave the Lord Captain a report with the supposed coordinates of the rebels' camps. The rebels were locked inside their lairs, preparing to take one last, desperate stand.

traits.locale_text: 机械修会的智者们向神圣的地质监测机器发出了祈求。在分析了地震活动的相关数据之后，他们向舰长大人提交了一份报告，其中包含叛军营地可能位置的坐标。残存的叛军躲在巢穴里，准备进行最后的孤注一掷。

languages.text: Los sabios del Adeptus Mechanicus apelaron a las sagradas máquinas de monitorización geológica con sus inquisitivas plegarias. Después de analizar las benditas cadencias de la actividad sísmica, entregaron {mf|al Lord Capitán|a la Lord Capitán} un informe con las supuestas coordinadas de los campamentos rebeldes. Los insurgentes se habían atrincherado en sus guaridas y se preparaban para librar una última batalla desesperada.
languages.original_text: The wise ones of the Adeptus Mechanicus appealed to the sacred machines of geological monitoring with prayerful enquiries. After analysing the blessed rhythms of seismic activity, they gave the Lord Captain a report with the supposed coordinates of the rebels' camps. The rebels were locked inside their lairs, preparing to take one last, desperate stand.

traits.locale_text: Los sabios del Adeptus Mechanicus apelaron a las sagradas máquinas de monitorización geológica con sus inquisitivas plegarias. Después de analizar las benditas cadencias de la actividad sísmica, entregaron {mf|al Lord Capitán|a la Lord Capitán} un informe con las supuestas coordinadas de los campamentos rebeldes. Los insurgentes se habían atrincherado en sus guaridas y se preparaban para librar una última batalla desesperada.

languages.text: Die Weisen des Adeptus Mechanicus wendeten sich betend an die heiligen Maschinen der geologischen Beobachtung. Nach Analyse der gesegneten Rhythmen seismischer Aktivität meldeten sie dem Lord Captain die vermuteten Koordinaten der Rebellenlager. Die Rebellen wurden in ihren Verstecken eingekesselt und bereiteten sich auf ein letztes, verzweifeltes Gefecht vor.
languages.original_text: The wise ones of the Adeptus Mechanicus appealed to the sacred machines of geological monitoring with prayerful enquiries. After analysing the blessed rhythms of seismic activity, they gave the Lord Captain a report with the supposed coordinates of the rebels' camps. The rebels were locked inside their lairs, preparing to take one last, desperate stand.

traits.locale_text: Die Weisen des Adeptus Mechanicus wendeten sich betend an die heiligen Maschinen der geologischen Beobachtung. Nach Analyse der gesegneten Rhythmen seismischer Aktivität meldeten sie dem Lord Captain die vermuteten Koordinaten der Rebellenlager. Die Rebellen wurden in ihren Verstecken eingekesselt und bereiteten sich auf ein letztes, verzweifeltes Gefecht vor.

languages.text: Les sages de l'Adeptus Mechanicus interrogèrent les machines sacrées responsables de la surveillance géologique. Après avoir analysé les rythmes bénis de l'activité sismique, ils rendirent {mf|au seigneur-capitaine|à la seigneure-capitaine} un rapport contenant les coordonnées potentielles des camps des rebelles. Enfermés dans leurs repaires, les insurgés se préparaient à un dernier affrontement désespéré.
languages.original_text: The wise ones of the Adeptus Mechanicus appealed to the sacred machines of geological monitoring with prayerful enquiries. After analysing the blessed rhythms of seismic activity, they gave the Lord Captain a report with the supposed coordinates of the rebels' camps. The rebels were locked inside their lairs, preparing to take one last, desperate stand.

Après avoir analysé les rythmes bénis de l'activité sismique, ils rendirent {mf|au seigneur-capitaine|à la seigneure-capitaine} un rapport contenant les coordonnées potentielles des camps des rebelles. languages.text: Adeptus Mechanicus'un bilgeleri, dualar eşliğinde sorularını kutsal jeolojik izleme makinelerine iletti. Yeryüzündeki kutsal sismik aktivitelerin ritimlerini analiz ettikten sonra Lord Kaptan'a isyancı kamplarının tahminî koordinatlarını içeren bir rapor sundular. İsyancılar; son, çaresiz bir savunma yapmak üzere çaresizce sığınaklarına kapanmıştı.
languages.original_text: The wise ones of the Adeptus Mechanicus appealed to the sacred machines of geological monitoring with prayerful enquiries. After analysing the blessed rhythms of seismic activity, they gave the Lord Captain a report with the supposed coordinates of the rebels' camps. The rebels were locked inside their lairs, preparing to take one last, desperate stand.
